easy.text: Make function, which adds two numbers but is immune for giving text or bool statements as arguments
Make list with things to do

intermediate.text: Make an app, which sends JSONs
Try to save the data on the device, for example using Core Data
Make custom view routing, try not to use the navigation link. Also then you can try to implement custom, beutiful animations

hard.text: Try to connect with webSocket API and make for example- stock price app
Make custom machine learing model and use it in your app
